command_create.error: There was an error trying to execute that command!

error.args_needed: This command needs arguments! But you didn't submit any.
error.args_min_length: This command takes at least %0 arguments! But you only submitted %1.
error.args_max_length: This command can only be passed with a maximum of %0 arguments! But you have submitted %1.
error.cooldown: There is a cooldown on this command. You have to wait another `%0` to be able to execute the command again.
error.guild_only: Sorry, I can only run this command in servers!
error.dm_only: I can only run this command in private chat with you!
error.need_permission:
You are not authorized to execute this command!
You need the following permissions to execute this command: %0
error.admin_only:
You are not authorized to execute this command!
Only bot admins can execute this command.
error.nsfw: Sorry, you can execute this command only in NSFW channels!

help.help: Without arguments, this command lists all executable commands. If a command is passed as argument, information about this command will returned.
help.intro:
List with all commands:
%0
You can send %1 to get information about a specific command!

dm.fail_console: Could not send help DM to %0
dm.fail_reply: It seems like I can't DM you! Do you have DMs disabled?

reload.invalid_command: There is no command with this name or alias %0!
reload.fail:
There was an error while reloading the command %0:
%1

lang.help:
Without arguments, this command outputs your currently set language. With an argument, this command sets your language to the passing language, if it exists.
Supported languages:
lang.set: Your language has been been set to: %0
lang.error: Error, I could not change your language (%0)!

prefix.help: Without arguments, this command prints the current prefix of the guild. With an argument, this command sets the prefix of the guild to the given one
prefix.too_long: The passed prefix is too long!
prefix.get: The prefix of this server is: %0
prefix.set: The prefix of this server has been set to: %0

bound.help: Bound existent voice channel to timer
bound.wrong_args: Wrong args. You should use this format:
bound.can't_find_channel: Can't find the given channel id

create.help: Create a voice channel and bound it to timer. In the optional custom text %d stands for the remaining time.
